featured.text: The women’s softball team that won gold for Japan at the Beijing Olympics is reported to have used blood-type theories to customize training for each player.

definition.zh_def: 一種類似於棒球的運動，使用較大的球和較短的棒球場。
definition.en_def: A sport similar to baseball, played with a larger ball and on a smaller field.
definition.example: She plays softball every weekend with her friends.
